des:
Compatible with Light & Effects Lebo Wireless Base Station Bulb, With Lettin Skill and Alexa,you can now interact your Lettin lights and rooms with Alexa voice control. Group your Lettin lights ,named the rooms,turn on and turn off the room.

To get start,go to “Skill” in the Alexa App , find Lettin, select the “Enable” button in the Link your Lettin account, and say, “ Alexa, discover devices”

Define rooms:
-Use the same name you set up already in the Lettin app.
-Creat a new group and named the group, for example : “Livingroom” 

Room Control:
To control several Lettin lights in the same room, simply tell Alexa to turn on/off <room name>
-“Alexa,turn on Living room
-“Alexa,turn off Living room
